decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards such as Stinkweed Imp and Golgari Grave-Troll, allowing the player to utilize cards like Ichorid and Prized Amalgam to generate a powerful board presence. The key strategy revolves around recurring threats from the graveyard with cards like Narcomoeba and Hollow One, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Mental Misstep. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts like Mishra's Workshop, Mana Crypt, and Grim Monolith to generate mana to cast powerful spells like Paradoxical Outcome and Tinker. The goal is to assemble a combo involving key artifacts like The One Ring, Time Vault, and Voltaic Key to generate infinite turns or mana to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Sink into Stupor to control the game while executing the combo. Karn, the Great Creator and Mystic Forge provide additional utility and card advantage to support the combo strategy.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage through efficient card draw and manipulation. With a strong counter suite, removal spells, and disruptive creatures, the deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value by allowing access to recurring threats from the graveyard. By carefully managing resources and leveraging powerful cards like Force of Will and Ancestral Recall, this deck seeks to outlast and outmaneuver opponents in the Vintage format.

The deck aims to utilize artifact synergy and card advantage to generate a powerful win condition through mass card draw and mana generation. It includes cards like Paradoxical Outcome, Mishra's Workshop, and Grim Monolith to quickly generate mana and draw cards, while also including key artifacts like Mana Crypt and The One Ring to further boost its capabilities. By efficiently chaining together spells and artifacts, the deck can overwhelm opponents with a powerful combination of resources and threats, ultimately leading to victory in the game.
